00040 /**
00041 * @file networkMessages.h
00042 * @date 2013/06/30 
00043 * @author Sergio Montenegro
00044 *
00045 * @brief Messages to be exchanged between nodes and network
00046 *
00047 */

00049 #pragma once
00050 
00051 #include <stdint.h>
00052 #include "params.h"
00053 #include "checksumes.h"
00054 #include "string_pico.h"
00055 #include "debug.h"
00056 #include "stream-bytesex.h"
00057 
00058 /******** Generic Network Message ***************/
00059 
00060 #ifndef NO_RODOS_NAMESPACE
00061 namespace RODOS {
00062 #endif
00063 
00064 #define MIN(_a, _b) ( (_a) < (_b) ? (_a) : (_b) ) 
00065 /**
00066  * Simple message data protocol to transmit data to a remote node.
00067  */
00068 class NetworkMessage {
00069     static const int HEADER_SIZE = 26;
00070     uint8_t header [HEADER_SIZE];
00071 public:
00072     inline void    put_checkSum(uint16_t x)          {int16_tToBigEndian(header+0, x); }
00073     inline void    put_senderNode(int32_t x)         {int32_tToBigEndian(header+2, x); }
00074     inline void    put_sentTime (int64_t x)          {int64_tToBigEndian(header+6, x); }
00075     inline void    put_senderThreadId(uint32_t x)    {int32_tToBigEndian(header+14, x); }
00076     inline void    put_topicId(uint32_t x)           {int32_tToBigEndian(header+18, x); }
00077     inline void    put_maxStepsToForward(int16_t x)  {int16_tToBigEndian(header+22, x); }
00078     inline void    put_len(uint16_t x)               {int16_tToBigEndian(header+24, x); }
00079     inline void    put_END_OR_HEADER(int8_t x)       { header[26] = x; }
00080 
00081     inline uint16_t get_checksum()             const { return bigEndianToInt16_t(header+0); }
00082     inline int32_t  get_senderNode()           const { return bigEndianToInt32_t(header+2); }
00083     inline int64_t  get_sentTime ()            const { return bigEndianToInt64_t(header+6); }
00084     inline uint32_t get_senderThreadId()       const { return bigEndianToInt32_t(header+14); }
00085     inline uint32_t get_topicId()              const { return bigEndianToInt32_t(header+18); }
00086     inline int16_t  get_maxStepsToForward()    const { return bigEndianToInt16_t(header+22); }
00087     inline uint16_t get_len()                  const { return bigEndianToInt16_t(header+24); }
00088     inline int8_t   get_END_OR_HEADER()        const { return header[26]; }
00089 
00090     uint8_t userDataC[MAX_NETWORK_MESSAGE_LENGTH]; ///< local buffer for user data
00091 
00092     /**
00093      * Copy constructor and assign operator that only copes nesacary data.
00094      */
00095     NetworkMessage() { }
00096     NetworkMessage(const NetworkMessage &oldMsg) { memcpy(this, &oldMsg, oldMsg.numberOfBytesToSend()); }
00097     NetworkMessage& operator= (const NetworkMessage& oldMsg) {
00098         if(this != & oldMsg) memcpy(this, &oldMsg, oldMsg.numberOfBytesToSend());
00099         return *this;
00100     }
00101 
00102     inline void dec_maxStepsToForward()    { put_maxStepsToForward(get_maxStepsToForward() - 1); }
00103 
00104     /** Copies user generated data into the message body.
00105      *
00106      * @param data pointer to input data stream to be transfered
00107      * @param length of message, supposed to be <= MAX_NETWORK_MESSAGE_LENGTH
00108      * @return length of message written
00109      */
00110     int32_t setUserData(const void* data, uint32_t len) {
00111         len =  MIN(len, MAX_NETWORK_MESSAGE_LENGTH); 
00112         memcpy(userDataC, data, len);
00113         put_len(len);
00114         return len;
00115     }
00116 
00117     /** Copies data from message received to a user provided buffer.
00118      *
00119      * @param destination pointer to output data stream received
00120      * @param length of message buffer, supposed to be <= MAX_NETWORK_MESSAGE_LENGTH
00121      * @return length of message copied
00122      */
00123     uint32_t getUserData(void* destination, uint32_t maxLen) {
00124         maxLen = MIN(maxLen, get_len());
00125         memcpy(destination, userDataC, maxLen);
00126         return maxLen;
00127     }
00128 
00129     /* WARNING: Len has to be set befor you call this.  **/
00130     uint32_t numberOfBytesToSend() const { return HEADER_SIZE + get_len(); }
00131     uint16_t calculateCheckSum()         { return checkSum(header+2, HEADER_SIZE-2 + get_len()); }
00132     bool     isCheckSumOk()              { return calculateCheckSum() == get_checksum(); }
00133     void     setCheckSum()               { put_checkSum(calculateCheckSum()); }
00134 
00135 } __attribute__((packed));
00136 
00137 
00138 /***** Topic list reports for network management ***/
00139 
00140 class TopicListReport {
00141 public:
00142     int32_t numberOfTopics;             ///< total number of topics assigned for the network
00143     int16_t topicList[MAX_SUBSCRIBERS]; ///< simple list of topic IDs subscribed for network
00144 
00145     TopicListReport() { init(); }      ///< Constructor, initializes topicList.
00146     void init() { numberOfTopics = 0; }
00147 
00148     /** Look up list, whether a topic is set for network messages.
00149      * @param[in] topicId ID to check whether topic is listed
00150      */
00151     bool find(const short topicId) const {
00152         for (int i = 0; i < numberOfTopics; i++) {
00153             if (topicId == topicList[i]) {
00154                 return true;
00155             }
00156         }
00157         return false;
00158     }
00159 
00160     /** Adds a new topic to list, if not already present.
00161      * @param[in] topicId ID to add to the list
00162      */
00163     void add(const short topicId) {
00164         if (numberOfTopics < MAX_SUBSCRIBERS - 1) {
00165             if (find(topicId)) {
00166                 return;
00167             }
00168             topicList[numberOfTopics] = topicId;
00169             numberOfTopics++;
00170         } else {
00171             ERROR("No more topics available\n");
00172         }
00173     }
00174 
00175     /// returns the size needed for transmission
00176     int numberOfBytesToSend() { return (sizeof(long) + numberOfTopics * sizeof(topicList[0])); }
00177 };
00178 
00179 #undef MIN
00180 
00181 #ifndef NO_RODOS_NAMESPACE
00182 }
00183 #endif
